description.en: Animation Digital Network is the best of the live animated Japan! See all Naruto Shippuden, Fairy Tail, Hunter x Hunter, Blue Exorcist, Code Geass, Vampire Knight, and more.
description.ga: Is é Animation Digital Network an chuid is fearr den tSeapáin bheoite bheo! Féach gach Naruto Shippuden, Fairy Tail, Hunter x Hunter, Blue Exorcist, Code Geass, Vampire Knight, agus go leor eile.
description.nl: Animation Digital Network is het beste van het live geanimeerde Japan! Bekijk alles van Naruto Shippuden, Fairy Tail, Hunter x Hunter, Blue Exorcist, Code Geass, Vampire Knight en meer.
description.vi: Animation Digital Network là một trong những nền tảng chiếu anime lớn nhất! Xem ngay Naruto Shippuden, Fairy Tail, Hunter x Hunter, Blue Exorcist, Code Geass, Vampire Knight, và hơn nữa.
description.zh: AnimationDigitalNetwork是最棒的日本在线动漫网站。
